short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your search results both from Aliexpress & Ebay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compare search results both from aliexpress and ebay by prefixing your query with the word "cmp" (for compare) you'll get both results from aliexpress and ebay easily
Comparing new items has never been so easy!
It's now the time to start comparing...

Important notices:
1. Pressing "Add to chrome" button is a confirmation you accept and agree the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Furthermore, by pressing the "Add to chrome" button you accept and agree to install Ali-Bay extension - This will set Chromeâ„¢ default search engine to Ali-Bay.
2. Prefixing any query with "cmp" on the search bar will reveal the functionality to compare aliexpress and ebay. Two new tabs will be opened, one for aliexpress and one for ebay
3. For queries not prefixed with the word "cmp" you'll be redirected simply to search engine.
